name: @ml-lubich/markpdf
description: Modern, powerful CLI tool for converting Markdown files to PDF with Mermaid diagram support, syntax highlighting, and advanced customization.

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: xo && tsc -p tsconfig.type-test.json && nyc ava src/test/lib.spec.ts src/test/help.spec.ts src/test/serve-dir.spec.ts src/test/validate-node-version.spec.ts src/test/config-service.spec.ts src/test/file-service.spec.ts src/test/markdown-parser-service.spec.ts src/test/get-marked-edge-cases.spec.ts src/test/server-service.spec.ts src/test/hash-utils.spec.ts src/test/domain/result.spec.ts src/test/domain/logger.spec.ts src/test/domain/errors.spec.ts src/test/domain/entities.spec.ts && ava src/test/api.spec.ts src/test/index.spec.ts && ava src/test/cli.spec.ts src/test/cli-service.spec.ts src/test/cli-edge-cases.spec.ts src/test/md-to-pdf.spec.ts src/test/generate-output.spec.ts src/test/output-generator-service.spec.ts src/test/output-generator-edge-cases.spec.ts src/test/process-mermaid.spec.ts src/test/mermaid-processor-service.spec.ts src/test/mermaid-parallel-processing.spec.ts src/test/mermaid-image-generation.spec.ts src/test/edge-cases-negative.spec.ts src/test/converter-service.spec.ts src/test/converter-service-edge-cases.spec.ts --timeout=2m
scripts.release: npm test && npx standard-version --infile=CHANGELOG.md && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish

author: Misha Lubich <michaelle.lubich@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ml-lubich)
